## 1.자금세탁 개요

Money laundering is the process of making dirty money look clean. Examples of related crime include
 
- Illegal arms sales
- Narcotics trafficking
- Smuggling
- Embezzlement
- Insider trading
- Bribery
- Computer fraud scheme

The rationality behind the global AML regime is based on the premise that it is possible to intervene in institutional authorities that mediate transactions in order to maximize financial transparency.
